name: @trevsmart/microscope-mcp-client
title: MiCroscoPe MCP client

scripts.run:cli:local: npm run build && bash -c 'source .env && node -r dotenv/config build/index.js --server "$TEST_MCP_SERVER" --log-level debug'
scripts.run:cli:npx: npm run build && node build/index.js --server npx:@modelcontextprotocol/server-everything --log-level debug
scripts.run:cli:http: npm run build && node build/index.js --server http://localhost:3000/mcp --log-level debug

author: Trevor Smart
description: MiCroscoPe is a lightweight command-line client that enables exhaustive testing of our MCP servers by AI agents.
